title: How to report people outside of the post-game lobby?

replies.body: Unfortunately, the only way to report a player is through the post-game lobby.  If you weren't able to or forget, don't fret!  We have a variety of different detection tools in place in addition to reports.  If someone is being consistently toxic, we will find them, and they will face justice.
Thanks for the reply. My client just shut down after the match so I wasn't able to report them, but I've calmed down now so everything is a-ok.

That rioter is wrong, I've reported through the riot games support website. Although there's no specific option for a report, you can submit a request as "I have a question about league of legends/Riot games" and ask them to investigate X player for Y offense. They usually reply telling you they'll investigate it, that you should use the in game report feature next time if you can, and that they cannot disclose any punishments inflicted on the player to you.

The link is on the top of your screen on the right, 3 spots right of boards. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
